title: my club wont pop up anymore
body: I created a club and out of nowhere, it wont pop up. Like the chat and the tag while in game.  I talked to one of my friends and he said I am still in the club but it wont pop up for me at all. Anyone know how to fix my problem.  I also created the club if that helps.

replies.body: Thanks for linking those resources, friends!    There's been quite a few issues with clubs since it re-enabled after some downtime per the below links.  We don't have any eta to offer right now, but we're working towards solutions.  Hang tight!

There's actually an update today, but that's a good reference too! :)

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/oc7O5QIE-club-has-disappeared?comment=003a
